meanings.definition: The quality or state of being like a dog.
meanings.sent1: Her caninity shone through as she wagged her tail happily.
meanings.sent2: The caninity of the puppy was evident in its playful behavior.
meanings.sent3: The party had a caninity theme, with guests dressing up as different dog breeds.
meanings.sent4: His loyalty and protectiveness showed his caninity as a friend.
meanings.sent5: The caninity of the old dog was heartwarming and comforting.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of resembling or relating to a canine.
meanings.sent1: The artist captured the caninity of the wolf in his painting.
meanings.sent2: The caninity of the husky made it a perfect sled dog.
meanings.sent3: The movie's main character had a caninity that made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a caninity that was infectious to those around her.
meanings.sent5: The caninity of the police dog was evident in its focused gaze.
